short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a/links is an extension for short, composable bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your workflow with short, composable bookmarks to quickly access your favorite sites. a/links is an extension that enables you to define a keyword to quickly access a URL.

For example, defining a keyword of "g" to navigate to "https://github.com" will allow you to type "a/g" in your browser's address bar to quickly navigate to the chosen destination.

You can also define dynamic a/links, meaning keywords and URLs can be defined with matching dynamic parts. For example, a keyword of "g/[organization]" and a URL of "https://github.com/[organization]" will allow you to type "a/g/github" to navigate to "https://github.com/github"

Features:
- static a/links
- dynamic a/links
